pkgmetadata.longdescription: Virtaal is a graphical translation tool. It is meant to be easy to use and powerful at the same time. Although the initial focus is on software translation (localisation or l10n), we definitely intend it to be useful for several purposes.

use.flag: Speed up Levenshtein measures using dev-pytho/python-levenshtein
Enable support for Machine Translation plugin using dev-libs/libtranslate
